original_text: So you are speaking against yourselves. You show that you are the sons of those people who killed God's prophets.
korean_text: 그러면 너희가 선지자를 죽인 자의 자손임을 스스로 증명함이로다

sentences.original_text: So you are speaking against yourselves.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 너희는 스스로를 향해 말하고 있다.

sentences.original_text: You show that you are the sons
of those people who killed God's prophets.
